function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variability of COVID-19 cases across different cities","Impact":"Unequal spread of COVID-19 cases, making it challenging to predict and respond to outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implementation of region-specific control measures and surveillance systems, along with travel restrictions","Technologies":"Geographic information systems (GIS) for tracking and analyzing case data by location","People":"Residents of different cities, travelers, public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inconclusive correlation between COVID-19 transmission and climatic parameters","Impact":"Lack of clear understanding of environmental factors influencing disease spread, leading to challenges in managing outbreaks based on climate","Mitigation":"Continued research and data collection to understand the relationship between climate and COVID-19 transmission","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technology for real-time data collection on temperature, humidity, and other relevant factors","People":"Scientists, environmental researchers, public health experts","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Global transmission of COVID-19 across diverse climates","Impact":"Increased complexity in managing and controlling the spread of COVID-19 due to its adaptability to various climate conditions","Mitigation":"International collaboration for sharing knowledge, resources, and best practices for disease containment","Technologies":"Telemedicine for remote healthcare delivery, global surveillance networks for monitoring disease spread","People":"Individuals in varied climate regions, global health organizations, policymakers","Owner":"International health authorities, global health organizations"}]}
